member.name: OLEVERB
member.summary: Defines a verb that an object supports. The method creates an enumerator that can enumerate these structures for an object, and supplies a pointer to the enumerator's .

member.name: OLEVERB.lVerb
member.summary: Integer identifier associated with this verb.

member.name: OLEVERB.lpszVerbName
member.summary: Pointer to a string that contains the verb's name.

member.name: OLEVERB.fuFlags
member.summary: In Windows, a group of flags taken from the flag constants beginning with MF_ defined in AppendMenu. Containers should use these flags in building an object's verb menu. All Flags defined in AppendMenu are supported except for MF_BITMAP, MF_OWNERDRAW, and MF_POPUP.

member.name: OLEVERB.grfAttribs
member.summary: Combination of the verb attributes in the enumeration.
